name: Failed Orbit
description:
Failed Orbit is a fast paced action game which was made in the Kenny jam 2021,  We currently have plans to maybe continue the game after the jam and add more content and better refine core mechanics and art, let us know if you want to see this or have any ideas in the community section below!

In failed orbit you have to try to take out the rockets and spaceships before they get to you and kill you you do this by rotating on the spot and using spacebar or left mouse click to fire your bullets, make sure to not fire to much as you will run out of energy and potentially die as you cant shoot, but don't worry you can begin to shoot after you wait a bit to regenerate your energy.

Very Simply!

Move - Mouse

Shoot - Spacebar or Left Mouse Button

Pause - Esc

1) download FailedOrbit.zip

2)unzip the zipped folder into and empty folder

3)run FailedOrbit.exe

4)play and have fun

                                                                        

We are planning on adding more levels and sounds to the game, we are also thinking about adding some customisable weapons for your turrets as well as different parts and different styled shooting and maybe more ships, however our ideas are not limited! if you have any ideas tell us about it we will be happy to see if we can fit it into  the game.

Made by
